title: Saltimbocca Burgers With Veal And Sage
summary: Saltimbocca Burgers With Veal And Sage might be just the American recipe you are searching for. This recipe serves 4. One serving contains 827 calories, 56g of protein, and 52g of fat. For $4.32 per serving, this recipe covers 37% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. Not a lot of people really liked this main course. 1 person were glad they tried this recipe. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 26 minutes. If you have extra virgin olive oil, semolina bread, fontina cheese, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 78%. This score is pretty good. Similar recipes are Veal escalopes wrapped with prosciutto, sage & lemon (saltimbocca), Veal Cutlets with Sage, Roman Style Saltimboccan alla Romana, and Veal Saltimbocca.
